name: The Archon Sewer
description:
A one and a half week prototype based on a One Page Dungeon layout. The prorotype is a short single level game where we explore a sewer while using a chargeable jump as our only form of movement. We also wanted to play around with a static perspective-less camera.

We hope you enjoy it :D

CONTROLS:

Space: Jump

Q: Turn anti clockwise

E: Turn clockwise

(Note: Use Alt+f4 to exit the game)

Made by : 

Alex Terradas

Eric Fullà

Raul Oliva
